channel.title: Cache downloader
channel.description: hey guys i bought a vps and want to start hosting tonight, i fixed up my source to how i want it but in order for the client to run i need to place the cache into my c-drive i want to know how make it to the cache can be inside the client folders like other servers, since i know people would want it auto done for them, also how do i hide my client files =)
